items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Love Love this Dress!!!!
items.body: I love,love,love,love,love this dress. Sweater dresses always look horrible on me. But THIS DRESS....Wow!!! It fit to a 'T'. The fabric is amazing- soft and durable with just the right amount of stretch. I wore this to church with some black boots. This looked very sharp! I'm 5'3 1/2 and have lost weight (thankfully) and I weigh 139lbs with an hour glass figure. I'm getting ready to order another one. The first one was in the blue- gorgeous color! Read more
items.author: Fashionista

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This is a beautiful dress. True to color & size, and made of quality material. It is not sheer and actually boasts a fair amount of thickness. Very comfortable. That being said, the fit on me was just kind of blah & not flattering. Unfortunately Iâ€™ll be returning. Read more

items.author: Ruth Vernon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fit and feel was perfect
items.body: I bought this dress to replace and old Ralph Lauren dress that got damaged and for years I've had no luck, I just wanted something simple, but nice fitting and not inchy, I seen this dress and so I ordered it. Once it arrived, I tired it on, the fit was just perfect, even in the length! I have long arms for a petite person so I always had to order a Misses size 4 or 2 in a blazer or a petite size 8 for the sleeves to come down to the end of my wrist touching the top of my hand. Now unless you are a petite 6 or 8 or a Misses size 4-6 you can not wear a small. I am 5'1" weight 118 and you see that this knit dress fits great, I am thin, but with a little bit of hips and backside and you see how the small fits me, I am strictly a petite 6-8 and a Misses 2-4 in dress most skirts, pants and tops which is a x -small and a small if it womens and a small in Petite depending on the cut fabric and what country it's made in, but ladies, this stretchy knit dress fits perfectly and it doesn't runs small it's true to size, for someone taller but around the same weight and size as I, the length would be shorter on you, this is the perfect length for me. NO, it is not thick or thin knit, it's medium weight and perfect for 60Â° and below fall, winter and early spring climates/temps and if you want the knecline shorter, you can roll it down and or double folder it down, you can also strunch the neck down and scarf it. If there are no cleaning instructions; Machine hand washing cycle or delicate using woolite, gentle spin, lay flat to dry even if you have to use your ironing board to do so. I worked in retail for maaaany years and I know may fabrics and you don't want this dress to loose shape, softness, perfect color and life span wear, Some fabris can loose all if this, especially using the wrong detergent, it can shorten the life expectancy of the fabric. Read more
items.author: carolyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing Belt
items.body: Delivered without the belt so it was an obvious return with no quality check before shipping. Read more
items.author: Bella

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Plum, White, Forestgreen, Apricot, Black, Camel, Coffee, Dustyblue, Oatmeal, Armygreen, Maple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
